Course-name: A Basic Course in Number Theory
content: This course intends to develop the basics of number theory touching upon many essential points such as the prime number theorem, quadratic reciprocity laws, Gauss?É¬¢?¢‚Äö¬¨?¢‚Äû¬¢ theorem on the classification of binary quadratic forms, Brahmagupta-Pell equations, to quote a few. This course will enable a student to learn more advanced topics in number theory.
